CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Hide net-zero transactions
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: For each regular transaction, Sia also makes a transaction that has a net effect on your wallet of zero, to confirm the value. Check this to hide transactions that do not affect your balance

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Use remote node
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Make API requests to a remote node, instead of the node running on this device

EditTextPreference.android:summary: The IP address and port number of the remote node. If you are not on the same network as it, you will have to port forward it

EditTextPreference.android:title: API password
EditTextPreference.android:summary: The API password set on the remote node
